title: Animate Islands
desc:
Post 6
*why are you in such a shitty position, ill just move you to a better one*
Features
- Traditional.
- Starts on 3 random squares on the board, nullifying the effect of that square.
- When owned, the owner must also roll a d3 at the start of their turn and must move the property that many spaces forward or backward, still nullifying the effect of the square it lands on.
